## DEFAULT\_INLINE\_EDIT\_URL variable

default value for the inline edit URL

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DEFAULT_INLINE_EDIT_URL = "${authoringUIBaseUrl.protocol}//${authoringUIBaseUrl.host}/authoring-sites-ui/inline-edit/inline-edit.js"
```
